title: 【临时工搬运】使命召唤-尸潮-Craigschlottke's WAW Zombies MC
author: 筒子
txt_content:
使命召唤-尸潮Craigschlottke's WAW Zombies MC


[paper]作者原话[paper]Update 2.0!? - Now Fully Functional!Major bug Actually Fixed nowOptomized Command Blocks for less lag9 Updates so far means that Lots of content was added! be sure to re-download!
Always remember to give credit! 1,062 command blocks don't code themselves!Now With a Youtube Video! Check it out! https://youtu.be/Dmty9myhmf8
This Update will fix the problem of Zombies Spawning outside the map, and make the game officialy bug free.
?Please leave a diamond if you download, It really helps!How the Game Works (in Case you didn't know)Choose a Player number at the spawn or pick forever alone (if you want it makes it easier).Press the start button.Fight and kill Zombies for 25 rounds to win!There are four tiers of shops, unlocked at certain rounds | tier 1: 5 | tier 2: 10 | tier 3: 15 | tier 4: 20 |There is also a pack-a-punch machine unlocked at round 10. You must find the button to go therealthough this game is playable with 1 person, It is highly recomended that you play with 2-4 playersHave Fun!
[book]简单翻译[book]请使用：1.8+的版本进行游戏地图已经修复僵尸生成问题，现在地图已经没有BUG了如果你下载了游戏请留下一颗钻石（我没有号啊！！）游戏开始按下按钮，进行25轮的僵尸生存虽然一个人也可以玩，但是建议多人游戏下面是本人自己的评价以及搬运的原因[diamond_gem]搬运理由[diamond_gem]很少搬运游戏类型的地图，因为英语对于我来说太难了，但是这次的这个地图，高大上的封面把我吸引了进去使命召唤...结果点开一看发现全是骗人的，是假的，是封面的特效所以我觉得不能让我一个人被坑，来吧，一起来玩吧，我们去杀僵尸[painting]图片欣赏[painting]
[board]作者信息[board]*点击图片跳转作者个人详细介绍*

更多搬运建筑请到：【临时工搬运】索引贴去寻找

replies.txt_content: 沙发。。。。。。要材质吗？材质的下载地址？

replies.txt_content: 这PVE很酷,有种惊悚的感觉

replies.txt_content: 感觉色彩很单一，看起来很乱......
